job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Full-Stack Software Developer, you will build and maintain our Conversational AI platform by integrating various ABN AMRO services and AI solutions to enhance customer service experiences through Chatbot Anna, Conversational IVR, and LLM-based Advisor Assist.

   At Team Advanced Conversational Engagement, part of the Customer Interaction Domain, we maintain and innovate our conversational bot, interactive voice response (IVR) systems, and internal Advisor Assist tools.

   Within the Platform team, you will be responsible for maintaining, enhancing, and innovating our Conversational AI Platform to support new features, ABN AMRO service integrations, and developments in the realm of Generative AI.

   Key Subject Areas:
     * Working on ABN AMRO service integrations for conversational solutions.
     * Enhancing platform tooling, including labeling and data annotation.
     * Expanding features for our Advisor Assist tooling., * Build and maintain applications within the scope of the Platform team.
     * Support the refinement and solution of features and projects.
     * Coach and guide junior developers.

Working at Customer Interaction

   You will be part of a multidisciplinary scrum team that owns products with end-to-end responsibility. Within our extended team of approximately 50 colleagues, you will collaborate closely with other developers, data scientists, data engineers, UX designers, content writers, and business analysts to achieve common goals.
job_details.full_text:
Full Stack Developer NodeJS

As a Full-Stack Software Developer, you will build and maintain our Conversational AI platform by integrating various ABN AMRO services and AI solutions to enhance customer service experiences through Chatbot Anna, Conversational IVR, and LLM-based Advisor Assist.

   At Team Advanced Conversational Engagement, part of the Customer Interaction Domain, we maintain and innovate our conversational bot, interactive voice response (IVR) systems, and internal Advisor Assist tools.

   Within the Platform team, you will be responsible for maintaining, enhancing, and innovating our Conversational AI Platform to support new features, ABN AMRO service integrations, and developments in the realm of Generative AI.

   Key Subject Areas:
     * Working on ABN AMRO service integrations for conversational solutions.
     * Enhancing platform tooling, including labeling and data annotation.
     * Expanding features for our Advisor Assist tooling., * Build and maintain applications within the scope of the Platform team.
     * Support the refinement and solution of features and projects.
     * Coach and guide junior developers.

Working at Customer Interaction

   You will be part of a multidisciplinary scrum team that owns products with end-to-end responsibility. Within our extended team of approximately 50 colleagues, you will collaborate closely with other developers, data scientists, data engineers, UX designers, content writers, and business analysts to achieve common goals.

profile_classification.rationale: The role focuses on building and maintaining a Conversational AI platform, integrating AI solutions, and working with LLM-based tools. While it involves software development and some data aspects, the core emphasis is on generative AI applications like chatbots and advisor assist, aligning with the GenAI Engineer profile.

phrases: build and maintain our Conversational AI platform
Build and maintain applications within the scope of the Platform team
Support the refinement and solution of features and projects
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate the core responsibility of building and maintaining software applications, including integrating services and supporting features, which are fundamental to software development.
The job description explicitly mentions working with AI solutions, LLMs, Generative AI, and specific applications like chatbots and IVR, which fall under the modeling aspect of AI development.

phrases: Enhancing platform tooling, including labeling and data annotation.
job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'data annotation' points to tasks related to preparing and processing data for AI models, which is a component of data engineering.
These phrases highlight the need to understand business objectives like enhancing customer service and integrating services to meet broader goals.

phrases: maintain and innovate our Conversational AI Platform
developments in the realm of Generative AI
job_tasks.justification: The emphasis on maintaining and innovating the platform, and supporting new developments, implies operational responsibilities for keeping the AI systems running and up-to-date.

skills: collaborate closely with other developers, data scientists, data engineers, UX designers, content writers, and business analysts
developments in the realm of Generative AI
Support the refinement and solution of features and projects
developments in the realm of Generative AI
